publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1360 Mr Keith Harding: Inverkeithing's Park-and-Ride Facility-That the Parliament welcomes the opening of a new park-and-ride facility at Ferrytoll, near Inverkeithing in Fife, which will give local motorists a better choice between driving and bussing into Edinburgh city centre.
S1M-1360 Inverkeithing's Park-and-Ride Facility (lodged on 15 November 2000) Mr Brian Monteith*

S1M-1360 Mr Keith Harding: Inverkeithing's Park-and-Ride Facility-That the Parliament welcomes the opening of a new park-and-ride facility at Ferrytoll, near Inverkeithing in Fife, which will give local motorists a better choice between driving and bussing into Edinburgh city centre. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith
S1M-1360 Inverkeithing's Park-and-Ride Facility (lodged on 15 November 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-1360 Inverkeithing's Park-and-Ride Facility (lodged on 15 November 2000) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-1360 Inverkeithing's Park-and-Ride Facility (lodged on 15 November 2000) Scott Barrie*, Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-1360 Mr Keith Harding: Inverkeithing's Park-and-Ride Facility—That the Parliament welcomes the opening of a new park-and-ride facility at Ferrytoll, near Inverkeithing in Fife, which will give local motorists a better choice between driving and bussing into Edinburgh city centre. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Scott Barrie, Nora Radcliffe
S1M-1360 Inverkeithing's Park-and-Ride Facility (lodged on 15 November 2000) Nick Johnston*
S1M-1360 Inverkeithing's Park-and-Ride Facility (lodged on 15 November 2000) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-1360 Mr Keith Harding: Inverkeithing's Park-and-Ride Facility-That the Parliament welcomes the opening of a new park-and-ride facility at Ferrytoll, near Inverkeithing in Fife, which will give local motorists a better choice between driving and bussing into Edinburgh city centre. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Scott Barrie, Nora Radcliffe, Nick Johnston, Donald Gorrie
S1M-1360 Inverkeithing's Park-and-Ride Facility (lodged on 15 November 2000) David Mundell*

S1M-1360 Mr Keith Harding: Inverkeithing's Park-and-Ride Facility-That the Parliament welcomes the opening of a new park-and-ride facility at Ferrytoll, near Inverkeithing in Fife, which will give local motorists a better choice between driving and bussing into Edinburgh city centre. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Scott Barrie, Nora Radcliffe, Nick Johnston, Donald Gorrie, David Mundell, Mary Scanlon*

Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Scott Barrie, Nora Radcliffe, Nick Johnston, Donald Gorrie, David Mundell, Mary Scanlon

S1M-1360 Mr Keith Harding: Inverkeithing's Park-and-Ride Facility—That the Parliament welcomes the opening of a new park-and-ride facility at Ferrytoll, near Inverkeithing in Fife, which will give local motorists a better choice between driving and bussing into Edinburgh city centre. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Scott Barrie, Nora Radcliffe, Nick Johnston, Donald Gorrie, David Mundell, Mary Scanlon, Tommy Sheridan, Robin Harper, Trish Godman
